solution_line_template: First find the cost of the two used computers: ${cost_per_used_computer}/computer * {num_used_computers} computers = $<<{cost_per_used_computer}*{num_used_computers}={total_cost_used_computers}>>{total_cost_used_computers}

Then subtract that cost from the cost of the new computer to find the savings: ${cost_new_computer} - ${total_cost_used_computers} = $<<{cost_new_computer}-{total_cost_used_computers}={savings}>>{savings}
